turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order an iced chestnut praline latte from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: From which starbucks would you like to order that from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Buckhead location at 2900 Peachtree Rd in Atlanta.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size drink would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No I would not like whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like any extra pumps of anything?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like an extra shot of espresso.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like anything sprinkled on top?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A little bit of cinnamon please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any extra sugar or cream or honey??

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No none of the above please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you have any coupons?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, no coupons.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How would you like me to pay?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I have an account and card on file. Can you repeat the order back to me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: A grande iced chestnut praline latte with almond milk and an extra shot of espresso. No whipped cream and with cinnamon sprinkled on top. This drink from the Starbucks at 2900 Peachtree Rd Atlanta GA
